    • Ship

      public Ship​(java.lang.String tempName, double tempSpeed, int tempCrew, double tempCargoCapacity, double tempDurability)
      Parameters:
      tempName - is name of ship to be assigned
      tempSpeed - is speed of ship to assigned
      tempCrew - is number of crew
      tempCargoCapacity - is cargo capacity
      tempDurability - is ship durability will initialize the ship by the given params
